settings.text: Become a member of one of Michigan's premier motorcycle clubs and gain access to our world-class facilities, exclusive events, and a community of passionate riders.

• Reduced Practice Fees: $25 vs $35 for non-members
  • Priority Registration: Early access to race events
  • Member-Only Events: Exclusive practice sessions and social events
  • Voting Rights: Participate in club decisions and track improvements
  • Discounts: Special pricing on club merchandise and concessions
  • Newsletter Access: Stay updated on events and track conditions
  • Guest Passes: Bring friends and family at member rates

Individual Membership - $150/year

Perfect for individual riders who want full access to all club facilities and events.

Family Membership - $250/year

Great for families with multiple riders. Includes spouse and children under 18.

Youth Membership - $75/year

For riders under 18 years old. Includes all member benefits at a reduced rate.

Supporting Membership - $50/year

For non-riders who want to support the club and receive newsletters and event updates.

All memberships include: AMA membership, club t-shirt, and access to member portal.

Step 1: Download and complete the membership application

Step 2: Obtain AMA membership (required for all riders)

Step 3: Submit application with payment to any club officer

Step 4: Attend new member orientation (first Saturday of each month)

Questions? Contact us at membership@battlecreekmotorcycleclub.com or call (269) 555-0123
